## typescript-library-boilerplate package

A small library for common math functions

## Functions

| Function                                                  | Description                                             |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| [avg(a, b, c)](./typescript-library-boilerplate.avg.md)   | Calculate the average of three numbers                  |
| [sum3(a, b, c)](./typescript-library-boilerplate.sum3.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Calculate the sum of three numbers |
